metadata.description: Wolverine, the greatest X-Men ever, is dead! With this mutant powerhouse now permanently out of the picture, various factions of both good and evil are scrambling to fill the void left by Logan's death! Will Wolverine's Legacy be shaped by heroes who valiantly fought alongside him or by those villains treacherous enough to have challenged him over the many years of his long life? Featuring X-23, Sabretooth, Daken, Lady Deathstrike and Mystique!
metadata.name: Death of Wolverine: The Logan Legacy
